item.description:
I am Herman, also known as igbuend. I wrote code on a TI58 calculator, a ZX Spectrum and an Amiga. I installed Slackware Linux from 24 floppy disks, my first Usenet post was on 24 September 1990 and it all went downhill from there.

I am a former developer, security consultant and PCI auditor. Now just a hacker.
